steps.name: Verify welcome page and login via staging deep link
Complete login flow and set username
Give consent to share anonymous usage data and verify landing on conversation page
Navigate to settings from conversation list
Verify anonymous usage data toggle is ON in privacy settings
Open debug settings and verify analytics identifier is visible
